StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerPoolBoardCandidatesFutureTBS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@OrgId int ,@CollegeId uniqueiden..er = NULL ,@FilterType varchar(4000) ,@MissionYear int = 0)
AS --Grad date is speci.cally for querying a datefromparts with the possiblity that the searched MY is 0. DECLARE @GradDate int SET @GradDate = case @MissionYear When 0 THEN 2 else @MissionYear END
IF @FilterType = 'None' BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT c.[NwaId] ,c.[NwaRowGuid] ,c.[O.cerContractId] ,c.[O.cerContractRowGuid] ,c.[Name] ,c.[RaceCode] ,c.[EthnicCode] ,c.[SchoolName] ,c.[SchoolCode] ,c.[SchoolRowGuid] ,c.[ProjectedCommissionDate] AS CommissionDate ,c.[GenderCode] ,c.[ClassNumber] ,c.[O.cerSourceCode] ,oss.[NAME] AS OssName ,c.[ShipMission] ,(SELECT TOP 1 DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] WHERE [STATUS_TYPE] = 'O' AND [STATUS_CODE] IN ('B', 'D') AND [DISPOSITION_CODE] = c.[Disposi.onCode] ) AS OcsTrainingType ,(SELECT TOP 1 cc.[COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION] FROM [dbo].[COMPONENT_CODE] cc WHERE cc.[COMPONENT_CODE] = c.[O.cerComponentCode]) AS Program FROM [usmc].[vwO.cerPoolBoardCandidatesFutureTBS] c INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] oss ON oss.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] WHERE c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] = @OrgId AND (@MissionYear = 0 OR c.[ShipMission] = @MissionYear) AND (@CollegeId IS NULL OR c.[SchoolRowGuid] = @CollegeId) AND (c.ProjectedGradDate IS NULL OR @MissionYear = 0 OR c.ProjectedGradDate > datefromparts((@GradDate-1), 7, 1)) AND ( (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'B' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in ('AI', 'AP', 'AS', 'AT', 'AW', 'AU', 'BC', 'Q', 'R', 'W','X', 'Y')) OR (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'D' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in('C') ) OR (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'F' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in ('A', 'B', 'K', 'L')) )
ORDER BY c.[Name] END ELSE BEGIN
DECLARE @ListofTypes TABLE(Type VARCHAR(40), Disposi.onCode varchar(10), TypeDesc VARCHAR(100), ID INT IDENTITY(1,1)); INSERT INTO @ListofTypes SELECT 'All', 'All', 'All' UNION ALL SELECT 'DistrictPendingAddi.onalInforma.on', 'AI', 'Pending Addi.onal Informa.on-District' UNION ALL SELECT 'OcsShipper', 'AP', 'OCS/Shipper' UNION ALL SELECT 'SubmitedToRegion', 'AS', 'Submited To Region' UNION ALL SELECT 'RegionPendingAddi.onalInforma.on', 'AT', 'Pending Addi.onal Informa.on-Region' UNION ALL SELECT 'ApprovedByMcrc', 'AW', 'MCRC Approved' UNION ALL SELECT 'DistrictRetain', 'BC', 'District Retain' UNION ALL SELECT 'Awai.ngSubmission', 'Q', 'Awai.ng Submission' UNION ALL SELECT 'ApprovedByRegion', 'AU', 'Region Approved' UNION ALL SELECT 'SubmitedToDistrict', 'R', 'Submited To District' UNION ALL SELECT 'DistrictSelected', 'W', 'District Selected' UNION ALL SELECT 'CompletedPlcJrTraining', 'X', 'Completed PLC JR Training' UNION ALL SELECT 'FullyTrained', 'Y', 'Fully Trained' UNION ALL SELECT 'Commission', 'C', 'Commission'
DECLARE @docHandle int -- Create internal representa.on of the XML document and return the xml-doc Handle ID EXEC sp_xml_preparedocument @docHandle OUTPUT, @FilterType
DECLARE @ListofCodes TABLE(Disposi.onCode varchar(10), TypeDesc VARCHAR(100), ID INT IDENTITY(1,1)); insert into @ListofCodes SELECT Disposi.onCode, TypeDesc FROM @ListofTypes where Type in ( SELECT FilterType FROM OPENXML(@docHandle, N'//item') WITH (FilterType VARCHAR(50)))
DECLARE @Count int
SELECT @Count = Count(*) from @ListofCodes WHERE Disposi.onCode <> 'All'
IF @Count = 0 BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT c.[NwaId] ,c.[NwaRowGuid] ,c.[O.cerContractId] ,c.[O.cerContractRowGuid] ,c.[Name] ,c.[RaceCode] ,c.[EthnicCode] ,c.[SchoolName] ,c.[SchoolCode] ,c.[SchoolRowGuid] ,c.[ProjectedCommissionDate] AS CommissionDate ,c.[GenderCode] ,c.[ClassNumber] ,c.[O.cerSourceCode] ,oss.[NAME] AS OssName ,c.[ShipMission] ,(SELECT TOP 1 DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[STATUS_DISPOSITION] WHERE [STATUS_TYPE] = 'O' AND [STATUS_CODE] IN ('B', 'D') AND [DISPOSITION_CODE] = c.[Disposi.onCode] ) AS OcsTrainingType ,(SELECT TOP 1 cc.[COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION] FROM [dbo].[COMPONENT_CODE] cc WHERE cc.[COMPONENT_CODE] = c.[O.cerComponentCode]) AS Program FROM [usmc].[vwO.cerPoolBoardCandidatesFutureTBS] c INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] oss ON oss.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] WHERE c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] = @OrgId AND (@MissionYear = 0 OR c.[ShipMission] = @MissionYear) AND (@CollegeId IS NULL OR c.[SchoolRowGuid] = @CollegeId) AND (c.ProjectedGradDate IS NULL OR @MissionYear = 0 OR c.ProjectedGradDate > datefromparts((@GradDate-1), 7, 1)) AND ( (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'B' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in ('AI', 'AP', 'AS', 'AT', 'AW', 'AU', 'BC', 'Q', 'R', 'W','X', 'Y')) OR (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'D' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in('C') ) OR (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'F' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in ('A', 'B', 'K', 'L')) )
ORDER BY c.[Name]
END ELSE BEGIN
SELECT DISTINCT c.[NwaId] ,c.[NwaRowGuid] ,c.[O.cerContractId] ,c.[O.cerContractRowGuid] ,c.[Name] ,c.[RaceCode] ,c.[EthnicCode] ,c.[SchoolName] ,c.[SchoolCode] ,c.[SchoolRowGuid] ,c.[ProjectedCommissionDate] AS CommissionDate ,c.[GenderCode] ,c.[ClassNumber] ,c.[O.cerSourceCode] ,oss.[NAME] AS OssName ,c.[ShipMission] ,lc.TypeDesc AS OcsTrainingType ,(SELECT TOP 1 cc.[COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION] FROM [dbo].[COMPONENT_CODE] cc WHERE cc.[COMPONENT_CODE] = c.[O.cerComponentCode]) AS Program FROM [usmc].[vwO.cerPoolBoardCandidatesFutureTBS] c INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] oss ON oss.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] INNER JOIN @ListofCodes lc on lc.[Disposi.onCode] = c.[Disposi.onCode] WHERE c.[Organiza.onOfRecordId] = @OrgId AND (@MissionYear = 0 OR c.[ShipMission] = @MissionYear) AND (@CollegeId IS NULL OR c.[SchoolRowGuid] = @CollegeId) AND (c.ProjectedGradDate IS NULL OR @MissionYear = 0 OR c.ProjectedGradDate > datefromparts((@GradDate-1), 7, 1)) AND ( (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'B' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in ('AI', 'AP', 'AS', 'AT', 'AW', 'AU', 'BC', 'Q', 'R', 'W','X', 'Y')) OR (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'D' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in('C') ) OR (c.[StatusType] = 'O' AND c.[StatusCode] = 'F' AND c.[Disposi.onCode] in ('A', 'B', 'K', 'L')) )
ORDER BY c.[Name]
END END
